#include <iostream>
//#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
long long int pow(int a,int i)
  {
  long long int h=1;
   for(int o=1;o<=i;o++)
       {
       	h=h*a;
       	
       }
   return h;    
  }
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int t,n,num,rem,q,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		n=n-1;
		num=0;
		i=0;
		while(n)
		{
			q=n/5;
			rem=n%5;
			n=q;
			num=num+pow(10,i)*rem;
		    i++;
		}
		cout<<2*num<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
